infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: {{i18next.t('Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location while using the app to offer you recipes and delivery services tailored to your immediate surroundings, such as finding the daily special at a nearby restaurant or the fastest delivery option available in your area.')}}
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: {{i18next.t('Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to always access your location to provide notifications and updates even when the app is not in use.')}}

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
